message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000.  I'm confident it can greatly benefit you, even at that price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this budget?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I can accept.  To move this forward, how about we meet in the middle at $18,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet the price of $18,000. Would it be possible to negotiate further? I am willing to pay up to $15,000.
